fact.description: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Colombia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Howard Webb awards Ivory Coast a goal kick.
Can Colombia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ivory Coast's half?
Howard Webb signals a Ivory Coast throw-in in Colombia's half.
Ball safe as Colombia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Colombia.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Colombia's Teofilo Gutierrez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ivory Coast have a goal kick.
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Colombia territory.
Howard Webb signals a Colombia throw-in in Ivory Coast's half.
Ivory Coast needs to be cautious. Colombia have an attacking throw-in.
Ivory Coast's Gervinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Colombia defender.
Corner awarded to Ivory Coast.
Colombia to take a throw-in in Ivory Coast territory.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast in their own half.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Ivory Coast.

Ball goes out of play for a Ivory Coast goal kick.
Free kick Colombia.

Free kick Colombia.

Colombia are coming forward and Teofilo Gutierrez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ivory Coast have a goal kick.
Howard Webb signals a throw-in for Ivory Coast, close to Colombia's area.
Howard Webb awards Colombia a goal kick.
Ivory Coast push forward through Serge Aurier, whose finish on goal is saved.
Howard Webb signals a Colombia throw-in in Ivory Coast's half.
Free kick Colombia.

Ivory Coast drive upfield and Die Serey gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Colombia defender.

Throw-in for Colombia at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Ball safe as Colombia is awarded a throw-in in their half.

Howard Webb signals a free kick to Ivory Coast.

Ivory Coast push forward at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia and Yaya Toure gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Colombia defence.
Throw-in for Colombia at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Teofilo Gutierrez of Colombia is pulled up for offside.
The first-half has ended.
Throw-in Ivory Coast.
1 minutes will be added to the first half in Brasilia.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Colombia in their own half.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Ivory Coast.
Howard Webb awards Colombia a goal kick.
Free kick Ivory Coast.
Ivory Coast's Yaya Toure breaks free at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia . But the strike goes wide of the post.

Colombia make their first substitution with Juan Quintero replacing Victor Ibarbo.
Howard Webb signals a free kick to Colombia in their own half.
Ivory Coast awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Colombia.
Colombia to take a throw-in in Ivory Coast territory.
Didier Zokora (Ivory Coast) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Pablo Armero for Colombia is whistled offside.

Ivory Coast awarded a free kick in their own half.

Colombia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivory Coast will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Colombia.
Colombia apply pressure at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Juan Cuadrado but the strike hits the bar!
Didier Drogba is on a sub for Wilfried Bony for Ivory Coast.
Corner awarded to Colombia.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast in their own half.
Ivory Coast have a dangerous throw-in.

That's a fine assist from Juan Cuadrado.

Salomon Kalou is on a sub for Max-Alain Gradel for Ivory Coast.
Yaya Toure (Ivory Coast) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.

Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
Important block from the Colombia defence as Yaya Toure fires in a strike for Ivory Coast.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Howard Webb.
Teofilo Gutierrez instrumental with a fine assist.

Colombia make their second substitution with Santiago Arias replacing Pablo Armero.

Great play from Arthur Boka to set up the goal.

Howard Webb has blown to resume play in Brasilia.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Juan Cuadrado.
Cheik Tiote (Ivory Coast) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Colombia's Juan Cuadrado looks ok and returns to the pitch.
